TEXT.S:
United Statesu United Statessa i labu nu amisay a Amilikaan, itiza i 38 00 N, 97 00 W,u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 9,833,517 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 9,147,593 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 685,924 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 323,995,528. kakalukan umah sa 44.50%, kilakilangan umah sa 33.30%, zumaay henay umah sa 22.20%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Washington, DC.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 4 bulad 7 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Joe Biden, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihca 1 bulad 20 demiad.
likisisumamaday nu Amilikasilaad tu ayday a mihcaan tu tulu a mang lima (35000) a malebut a mihcaan, micapi tu ayda a kasisuledaan nu katalakawan nu mihcaan, mahamin nu kitakitay a yadahay nu nanum a ahebalay masaluimeng i Talu sulesuledaan, ahebal han makaala tu cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a kun-li nu kayakay tu dadan mitulin tu Asiaatu amisay a Amilikaancacay a mang idaw ku tusaay a malebut, tademaw han idawtu ku mueneng i satipan nu pangkiw a kitakit (tipay a pangkiw. misatadasay a Amilikaana tademaw namakayda i Ya-cuo (Asialakuyden nuheni ku kayakay , makatukuh tu mahidaay tu Alaska (A-la-se-cia ), paluma sa cacayay tu a malebut ku eneng.
kilul sa pasayda i nutimulan nu aydaay a Amilika. paluma'sa i nutipan amisa Taypin-yunga dadipasan, nutipan nutimulan a buyu aut likelikenan atu teban nutipan a Mississippi (Mi-si-si-pi-sauwac ) nu dadipasan. (Hohokam)(Adenans)(Hopewellians)(Anasazi) sumamadany a niyadu'ay a binacadan u Ho-Ho-Ka-Mu (Hohokam, ), A-Tai-Nan-Se (, Adenans), Hupiwi-lianse (, Hopewellians) atu Ana-saci (, Anasazi).
patideng kunuheni tu niyadu' paluma tu cacanan a papalumaan, idaw ku patidengay tu sadicum masangkakuay a luma', ayam atu bau a waywayan nu nisangan tu lala' kalihalayan nuheni a kakilulan tu sasinzaan caay kaw kakaliwhan.
u lalangawan nuheni u nakamuwan ku kakilulan, nuka idaw ku duma a binacadan u sulit ku sulitan, kiluken nuheni ku sulit amisinga.
capi nu mihcaan a likisi(Hopi)(Zuni) numi satadasay a tademaw mikilul tu demiad haymaw sa amalawpes, katinenganay nu aydaay a Amilikaan yincuminkumikutaya, idaw ku Hopi a binacadan (Ho-Pi ) atu Zuni a binacada (Cu-Ni ). makatukuh satu ku Europe (O-cuo ) a tademaw itini i Amilikasa, idaw tu ku tusa a bataan (200) a mang nu tademawan, hakiya nu yadah a yuncumin muenengay i Amilika. 985(Erikthe Red) misatadasay makatukuhay i pea-meaa Europe (O-cuo ) a tademaw u Pea-o Europea tademaw, nu aydaay a siwmea a nakamuan. makayda kunuheni i Greenland (Ke-lin-lan ) pasayda i nutipan amuculil, kya makaala tu siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku lima (C.E. 985 a mihcaan, sumanahay a bukes ci Ayzuyke' (Erikthe Reditida i Greenland (Ke-lin-lan ) patideng tu lalaliwmaahn. (Leif)1001(L'Anse aux Meadows) saan ku katuuday, wawa nida ci Lie-Bu (, Leif) itini i siyun cacay a malebut idaw ku cacay (C.E. 1001 a mahcaan mitahaw tunu aydaay a Canada (Cia-na-ta ) a wali amisan. tawyaay a Pei-oa luma' tu maliwanay itida tu i Newfoundland (Niyu-fung-lan ) amisan a L'Anse aux Meadows (Lan-say-aw-ce , ) kaadihan. 500100 micapitu limaay a mihcaan sa, idaw satu ku Europe (O-cuo ) a tademaw makatukuh i Amilikaan (Pia-man ), milakuuyd tu cacay a lasubu (100) a mihcaan, kya idaw satu ku matenesay nu liyumahan a tahekal. numitadasay a mitahaway a tademaw, mikilimay tu saka tayda i Asia (Ya-cuo ) nu kakaydaan nu balunga. (Genoa)(Christopher Columbus)(Isabella) sasinganganay nu mitahaway a tademaw namakayda i Genoa (Ze-Nuo-Ya ) a Kelun-pu (Christopher Columbus ) uculil nida namakayda i Spain ni-wanci Isa-paila (Isabellaku mipadangay tu saculil nida. 1492 cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1492) a mihcaan, Columbus (Ke-lun-pu ) itida i Cia-le-pi bayua subalan makatukuh, caay kaw katineang alaw mala Amilikaa baluhay. 1500 cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a mihcaan u Sipan-ya (Spainitida i Amilikanmitahaw a kalimulakan. (Juan Ponce de Le칩n)15131539(Hernando de Soto)1540(Francisco V치zquezde Coronado) 1522 ci Huang Pens Le-aw (, Juan Ponce de Le칩n) i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1513) a mihcaan nu aydaay a Florida (Fou-luo-li-ta-cuo ) makatukuh, cacay a milbut lima a lasubu tulu a bataan siwa (1539) a mihcaan, ci Henadu.sutuo (, Hernando de Soto) sayaway makatukuh i Florida (Fuo-luo-li-ta ), micumud aca tayda i Misisi-pi a sauwacmitahaw, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu sepat a bataan (1540) a mihcaan, ci Falansise.Keluonatu ( Francisco V치zquezde Coronado) namaka cacay a malebtu lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1522) a mihcaa mahiya madebung nu Si-pan-yaku Mexico (Muo-si-ke ) pasaydan i amis muculil. (Seven Cities of Cibola)(Grand Canyon)(Great Plains) mangalay mikilim tu nakamuwan nu babalaki a Sipuo-laci tukay ( (Seven Cities of Cibola), amica kunikacaay ka tepa', naculilan mamin ku Yalisan-na a cascasan ( Grand Canyon) atu " Tay-pinyun a enal" (, Great Plains). (Giovanni da Verrazano) (Jacques Cartier)(Amerigo Vespucci) namaka Sipan-ya (Spaina tademaw pasayda i amis micumud sa, aydaay a Amilikanu amisan a kitidaan hamaw han nu O-cuo (Europemitahaway a tademaw amicumud, nina mitahaway a tademaw pasu ci (, Giovanni da Verrazano), ci Ciakua. kati-ay ( Jacques Cartier) atu mala Mei-cuo talu kasinganganan a Yamei-like. wisepu-ci ((Amerigo Vespucci). 1500 Amilikamisatadasy u O-cuo (Europea tademaw ku patidengay tu sakatenesay nu ka kaykunngan sa i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a mihcaan nu teban, u Sipan-ya (Spaina tademaw itda i Fuoluo-litaa (augustine (Senaw-kuse-tin ) patideng.
sa, nina kabulawan a kitidaan itini i Amilikanu baluhay a kanatal anikaydaan apatideng sa, nai' ku hahicahicaan a kawaw. 10 tadengaay numikawaway han nui amisay nu Tasi-yungdadipasan nanay a sakabulawan a kitidaan, mahida ci Virginia (Wi-ci-ni-ya ), Massachusetts (Ma-sa-cu-say ), New Yorkatu duma nu cacay a bataan a kitidaan, itida hantu yadah yadah ku nakaka O-cuo (Europeay a mabulaway nu tademaw. 17 sabaw tu pitu (17) a seci mahka tayniay i Peime-ingkuokabulawan a kitidaan u Ing-kuo (United Kingdoma tademaw ku yadahay, duma hantu namaka He-lan(Netherlands, Zuy-tin (SwedenDe-kuo (Germany, Fa-kuo (France, maudang idaw ku namaka Suke-lanatu Pei-ayel-lan (Irelanda mabulaway. idaw kumiliyasay tu luma' han umilaliway tuni kalepacawan, zhengzhi yapo, midis tu kiwkay atu mipatay. 133 mabulaway tayni i Amilikayadah ku hahinian sa, sadikuday satu kunuheni patideng tu sabaw tu tulu (13) nu caaya kalecad a kabulawan nu kitidaan. nina picidekayn itini i tuluay a kitidaan ku kakatinengan. COLONIAL PERIOD8 kabulawan sa a zitayCOLONIAL PERIOD8, mitadasay a mabulaway a tademaw han patideng i lilis dadipasan a Tasi-yungatu pasaydaay i bayuay a sawacan nu lilililisan.
wali amis idaw ku kilang mitahap tu buyu, ulala hantu nanu kasisuledaan a zitay nika lasuan nu kuli tu liwan a ba'tu, nanuman saka lihalaysan amicukamas, Sining-kelan Englanda kitidaan nu Masa-cuse', Kannay-di-ke'atu Luode-subal, mapalekal tu nisanga'an tu kilangababutinganmisangan tu balunga atu sasiwbayan tu sakaudip.
tebanay a kabulawan nu kitidaan mapulung tu Niw-ye (New Yorkatu Pinsi-funi-yanu mabulaway atu yincumin nikalecabayan, u nikapapadang atu nika cinlaw ka talawan anika pulungan. amica kuyu nikasasiwbayan atu nikalecabayan, anu saahebal satu kumabulaway a tademaw, idaw ku malakalungay a tademaw mangalay misalihalay sa laliw satu.
